domain.update.contracts

Interface IUpdateSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBasicUpdateSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IUpdateProcessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionInput, BasicUpdateProcessor, CompositeAction, CompositeActionFly, CompositeActionFlyCatch, ForcedRemiseObserver, GameController, InputProvider, OutOfMovesObserver, PromotionObserver, RemiseInput, ResignInput, UpdateProcessor, UpdatePropagator, UpdateSource

    public interface IUpdateSource
extends IBasicUpdateSource
    Provides a basic interface for every class that wants to accept IObservers and send them updates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSubscribed(IBasicObserver observer)
      Returns true if the given observer is already subscribed, false otherwise.
      void subscribe(IObserver observer)
      Subscribe an observer to receive future updates about the game.
      void unsubscribe(IObserver observer)
      Unsubscribe an observer to stop receiving updates about the game.

      • Methods inherited from interface domain.update.contracts.IBasicUpdateSource

        isSubscribedBasic, subscribeBasic, unsubscribeBasic

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(IObserver observer)
        Subscribe an observer to receive future updates about the game.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer that will receive updates.

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(IObserver observer)
        Unsubscribe an observer to stop receiving updates about the game.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to unsubscribe.

      • isSubscribed

        boolean isSubscribed(IBasicObserver observer)
        Returns true if the given observer is already subscribed, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to check
